name: DoorFrameToHell
description:
Hey kiddo! ya like what ya see? all those bright colours and fun shapes, well what are ya waitin' for, hop in and play this cool roguelike, based around all kinds of sweets and treats, where you collect disembodied heads to add to your collection, doesn't that sound like fun?... what... "no"?

Well we have whacky enemies and a big scary boss, with it's victims (there's only one victim) and my shop!

Wait... Whaddya mean it "Hasn't been added yet"!... what you didn't have "time"?

Ah screw off, I'm goin' now, it's not like what it seems kiddo, after playin' go to this link : https://botphire.wixsite.com/01010100-01101000-01 , it's very important, I'm the only that hasn't been hypnotized, I haven't been phased, but they think I have been, you're lucky I don't kill ya right there. Aight, now I'm off, good luck kiddo..

Art: https://botphire.itch.io/

Music: https://soundcloud.com/arehartsounds/sets/portfolio

Coding:
